Hmm.  You have nailed my type of character in your story when you 
portayed me: overwhelming force.  It may be a slow weapon, but it's a 
dangerous one.

I will be assuming that you will have characters helping each other in 
attacks.  Like the Telvido casting a spell on the hammer to give it 
even more power, for cases where no individual's attacks alone would 
be strong enough.
